title: Playbook
description: Playbook is a web application that allows gamers to connect, share, and discover new games. Using the IGDB API, Playbook provides users with access to detailed information about games, including reviews, ratings, and gameplay footage. Users can create a profile, follow other gamers, and comment and like games they've played.

title: Secure Chat App
description: A console based python end-to-end encrypted chat application with self-designed authentication protocols entirely functioning using UDP.

title: Tuiter
description: Unfinished twitter clone as a learning project

title: RSA AES-CBC Hybrid Encryption
description: An python implementation of a hybrid encryption system involving RSA, and AES256-CBC
